channel.title: RS-Reborn - The Website Is Here!
channel.description:
[img]http://puu.sh/6Cc87.gif[/img]
Website: Send me a P.M. for the link, or just use common sense.
RS-Reborn aims to emulate the 464 revision. The server build is a scratch NIO framework.
[b][size=14pt]Media (View the whole thread for more media)[/size][/b]
[img]http://puu.sh/6GOQm.jpg[/img]

great updates and THANK YOU MICHAEL

@dwarfs222
I’ll probably have some kinda of testing stage, not anytime soon though.

OT:

Single door’s have been added. All load through cache.

EDIT; Started working on Ent’s and the flying axe random.

item.title: RS-Reborn - The Website Is Here!
item.dc:creator: @Michael_P1 Michael P
item.description:
@Michael_P1 wrote:

[B][U]Important Update:[/U][/B]

We’ve decided to bring back the 317! At first I decided to stop the development on the 317 due to lack of time to have two different revisions, two different servers; however I’ve decided to bring it back now as I’ve gotten a team specifically for the 317 along with a team specifically for the 464.

Although our team for the 317 isn’t very big, it’s still enough to get the job done at this point in time. Currently we have only two people working on the 317; [URL=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=547809]Rodgerwilco[/URL] and me. As for the 464, it’s the same team; [URL=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=228152]Enzo42[/URL] and me. Yes, I will be working on both 317 and 464.

I will update the OP tomorrow.

EDIT:

Managed to get an update in today!

Woodcutting is nearly complete. We’re currently only missing bird’s nest and random event’s; bird’s nest will be added once ground item support is added and random event’s will be added once combat is supported!

Read full topic

item.title: RS-Reborn - The Website Is Here!
item.dc:creator: @Sir_James1996 Sir James1996
item.description:
@Sir_James1996 wrote:

Clawz fury:

how the fuck are you doing this so fast ive been working on a framework for like almost a week now and im just getting rendering done

Some of us are not as slow, sorry.
Goodluck man.

Read full topic

item.title: RS-Reborn - The Website Is Here!
item.dc:creator: @Michael_P1 Michael P
item.description:
@Michael_P1 wrote:

[quote=“Scully, post:58, topic:539004”][quote author=Michael P link=topic=657843.msg4405978#msg4405978 date=1391985055]
We currently just got a new cache since our old one was all messed up. Our new one has maps fixed, it also has music packed into it. We’re going to spend the next day or two getting as many region’s added into the music system as possible. Once it’s complete I will post a video showing it off.

If you’re wondering why we’re worried about music this early on, it’s to help motivate us TBH. Hearing that good ol’ RS music in such a nice revision just motivates me so much!

Old maps

Fixed maps

[/quote]

So you replaced the correct object maps that were clearly around the time of 464 to match the 377 landscapes? That hardly makes any sense. If I were you I’d try to load the XTEA keys from the 468, at the time of launch before Jagex scrambled the data. Might want to try to put back the objects, which were correct by the way, and change to the 464 landscapes.[/quote]

Yea I just noticed it was 377 maps… I will change them back to 464 when I get a chance.

Updates:

Just got back home the other day, so updates should be coming in now.

Music system is nearly complete, it’s just missing the looping feature (I think this is client sided); however you can turn it on and off, though it doesn’t make any difference. Music does unlock, though it didn’t send the message during this era of RuneScape, so I didn’t implement it.

[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vW7-Lb5SZv8[/youtube]

Read full topic

item.description:
@Scully wrote:

[quote=“Michael P, post:56, topic:539004”]We currently just got a new cache since our old one was all messed up. Our new one has maps fixed, it also has music packed into it. We’re going to spend the next day or two getting as many region’s added into the music system as possible. Once it’s complete I will post a video showing it off.

If you’re wondering why we’re worried about music this early on, it’s to help motivate us TBH. Hearing that good ol’ RS music in such a nice revision just motivates me so much!

Old maps

Fixed maps
[/quote]

So you replaced the correct object maps that were clearly around the time of 464 to match the 377 landscapes? That hardly makes any sense. If I were you I’d try to load the XTEA keys from the 468, at the time of launch before Jagex scrambled the data. Might want to try to put back the objects, which were correct by the way, and change to the 464 landscapes.

item.title: RS-Reborn - The Website Is Here!
item.dc:creator: @Racc0wn Racc0wn
item.description:
@Racc0wn wrote:

[quote=“Michael P, post:54, topic:539004”][quote author=kronikz link=topic=657843.msg4405199#msg4405199 date=1391735585]
Hows the progress?
[/quote]

Good. Thanks for the bump too, was just about to post some updates.

Spent the past few days dumping information from the 2007.runescape wikia page’s. The following has been dumped:

[ul][li]Equipment definitions[/li]
[li]NPC drops (these are not finished yet)[/li]
[li]Item weights[/li]
[li]Full 464 item definitions[/li][/ul]

Today’s updates:

[ul][li]NPC rendering is complete; only missing hit mask. Those will be added once combat has been started[/li][/ul]

[/quote]

Awesome!

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Michael_P1 Michael P
item.description:
@Michael_P1 wrote:

[quote=“artem543, post:51, topic:539004”][quote author=Michael P link=topic=657843.msg4404974#msg4404974 date=1391648223]

Nice updates man, I hope this project ends up being successful!

Thanks!

Sorry for the lack of updates lately, me and Enzo have been busy dumping a whole bunch of information from the OSRS/2007 wiki. Some t hings we’re dumping: NPC drops, item defs, & equipment defs.
[/quote]

Why not read data from the cache like hyperion does?[/quote]

We have the item defs from a 464 Hyperion, so we’re good on that. I’m almost certain that the cache doesn’t have NPC drops, nor equipment definitions (all the bonuses + the slot). I could be wrong though.

item.title: RS-Reborn - The Website Is Here!
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

[quote=“Scully, post:46, topic:539004”][quote author=Clawz fury link=topic=657843.msg4404224#msg4404224 date=1391399645]
how the fuck did you guys make two frameworks and add a significant amount of content to them in like a week

good job
[/quote]

It’d be one framework, and how in the world is rendering, movement, button clicking, equipment, and inventory items really a huge amount of work? Not to mention X-Logic wrote the frameowrk, and the packets are already documented. I’m not quite understanding what you think a lot of work is?[/quote]

well obviously what is considered a lot of work varies between people

p.s it’s just a name, you’ll get over it. so much butthurt

Read full topic

how the fuck did you guys make two frameworks and add a significant amount of content to them in like a week

good job

Yea, not to mention that the 317 was all documented on the wiki. The 464 framework we’re using is partly mine, partly his. I only used a few things from his, the rest is mine.

The website has been approved!

Si Force:

Sorry for the late reply - if it hasn’t already been approved then consider it so.

item.title: RS-Reborn - The Website Is Here!
item.dc:creator: @artem543 artem543
item.description:
@artem543 wrote:

Michael P:

So today I’ve decided to just have the 464. Since theses are custom scratch frameworks, there is a lot of work to be put into them. With having two of them, just puts the work amount way too high with the tight scheduled I have. Me and Enzo42 have decided to just focus on the 464. We may bring the 317 back in the future, maybe. Hopefully this will allow us to put all of our time into one revision and hopefully get updates done a lot faster.

Good luck. 464 has more potential than 317,

Read full topic
